short_description: markwe international is an educational consultant based in kozhikode, india.
long_description: pursue masters / ph.d from top universities in france. markwe international is one of the renowned study in france consultants in calicut, kerala, founded in 2019. our main focus is to provide top-notch study abroad assistance to indian students who aspire to study at international educational institutions, especially in france. we take pride in offering excellent guidance and counselling services that help students make informed decisions about their overseas education. our consultancy provides opportunities for students to study abroad in many of the best educational destinations across the world- including france, uk, usa, australia, canada, ireland and new zealand. at markwe international, we offer comprehensive study abroad support for pursuing quality graduate, postgraduate, and professional study courses in top, renowned universities & colleges worldwide. that is why we have a dedicated team focusing only on scholarships for indian students. at mark we international, we have been helping students with making them aware of the different scholarships available, choosing the best scholarship for them, and hence overall boosting the speed of their study abroad journey.

generated_description: mark we international is a consultancy firm based in kozhikode, kerala, founded in 2019. the company specializes in providing comprehensive support for students pursuing study abroad programs, particularly in france. mark we international offers guidance on selecting educational institutions, visa applications, scholarship assistance, and financial aid. the firm also provides services such as test preparation, application and admission assistance, and pre-departure orientation to ensure a smooth study abroad experience. their team of experts assists students in navigating the complex process of studying abroad, including securing scholarships and government subsidies.
